DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate safety and effectiveness of ACRYSOF Multifocal Single-piece Intraocular Lens (IOL) Model SN6AD1 when implanted to replace the natural lens following cataract removal.
DOC.criteria: Planned bilateral cataract removal by phacoemulsification Potential postoperative best corrected visual acuity of 0.5 or over 1.5 Diopter (D) or less of astigmatism preoperatively, measured by keratometry Poorly controlled glaucoma Progressive diabetic retinopathy
